str:translations.str:about_feeds: This is a web feed, also known as an Atom feed. Subscribe by copying the URL from the address bar into your newsreader. Visit About Feeds to learn more and get started. It's free.

entry.title: Building a Change Data Capture Pipeline with AWS and Kafka
entry.summary: This blog post provides a step-by-step guide on how to build and configure a change data capture pipeline that captures all changes in a database and writes them into an audit log table in a useful format. The post covers the architecture of the pipeline, services used, and tips on how to set up each component.
